values.name: derived-from
values.description: The information in the target object is based on information from the source object.

values.name: duplicate-of
values.description: The referenced source and target objects are semantically duplicates of each other.

values.name: related-to
values.description: The referenced source is related to the target object.

values.name: attributed-to
values.description: This referenced source is attributed to the target object.

values.name: targets
values.description: This relationship describes that the source object targets the target object.

values.name: uses
values.description: This relationship describes the use by the source object of the target object.

values.name: indicates
values.description: This relationships describes that the source object indicates the target object.

values.name: mitigates
values.description: This relationship describes a source object which mitigates the target object.

values.name: variant-of
values.description: This relationship describes a source object which is a variant of the target object

values.name: impersonates
values.description: This relationship describe a source object which impersonates the target object

values.name: authored-by
values.description: This relationship describes the author of a specific object.

values.name: located
values.description: This relationship describes the location (of any type) of a specific object.

values.name: included-in
values.description: This relationship describes an object included in another object.

values.name: analysed-with
values.description: This relationship describes an object analysed by another object.

values.name: claimed-by
values.description: This relationship describes an object claimed by another object.

description: Default type of relationships in MISP objects.
name: relationships
